author: morten
msg: Added a '-i' option to the command-line compiler to allow stylesheets to be
passed in through stdin. The '-i' option must be used with the '-o' option

author: morten
msg: Gave the parent/sibling stacks in the DOM builder dynamic length.

author: morten
msg: A fix for determining the current working directory when loading XML
documents using the document() function. The base URI (that gives you
the CWD) should normally be taken from the context node, but can also
be determined by the node/node-set defining the document URI.

author: mmidy
msg: Bugzilla 4218: Make sure that the stack frame gets restored to the frame that was previously set. Just calling unlink() may restore to the wrong frame, and get us out of synch.

author: jkesselm
msg: Java 1.1.8 back-compatability requires not using Java 1.2 collection calls.
(Still waiting for community consensus before abandoning 1.1)
